title: Custom E-liter 4K
content:
The Custom E-liter 4K is a main weapon in Splatoon 2 and Splatoon 3. It is the Custom version of the E-liter 4K.

- 4.1 Translation notes

In Splatoon 2, the Custom E-liter 4K is nearly identical in appearance to the E-liter 4K. The only difference between the two is that the Custom E-liter 4K has a sticker bearing the Custom logo on the ink tank.

In Splatoon 3, the Custom sticker is still present, but the color of the weapon's plastic grips/supports is now red instead of blue.

The Custom E-liter 4K was released on 14 October 2017 at 02:00 UTC.[1] It comes with Squid Beakons and the Bubble Blower and the ability to store a charge for one second.

- The Custom E-liter 4K is a heavyweight weapon.

- The matchmaking range is 310. The game's matchmaking system looks at a team's average matchmaking range value, and matches them against a team with a similar average.

- Ink consumption scales from 2.25% to 25% depending on the charge level.
The full-charge ink consumption of 25% allows players to fire 4 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.
This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- The full-charge ink consumption of 25% allows players to fire 4 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.

- This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- The Custom E-liter 4K can store its charge while submerged in ink.
A stored charge can be held for up to 1.25 seconds.
The Custom E-liter 4K can only store its charge if the weapon is fully charged.

- A stored charge can be held for up to 1.25 seconds.

- The Custom E-liter 4K can only store its charge if the weapon is fully charged.

- The delay between being submerged in ink with a stored charge and being able to fire the charge is 25 frames.
The delay between being submerged in ink with a stored charge and the laser appearing is 20 frames.

- The delay between being submerged in ink with a stored charge and the laser appearing is 20 frames.

- It takes 1.53 seconds to fully charge the weapon.
When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.6 seconds.
When charging a shot while in the air, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.6 seconds.

- When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.6 seconds.

- When charging a shot while in the air, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.6 seconds.

- Fully charged shots will  pierce opponents.

- When charging while moving, the player's movement speed is set to 0.15 units per frame.

- After firing, there is a 20 frame cooldown before the ink tank starts refilling.

- Damage scales from 40 to 80 depending on the charge level. At full charge, the damage is 180.

- Shot velocity scales from 24 to 64 depending on the charge level. At full charge, the velocity is 96.

- Shot distance scales from 90 to 291 depending on the charge level.

- The full-charge ink consumption of 25% allows players to fire 4 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.

- This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- A stored charge can be held for up to 1.25 seconds.

- The Custom E-liter 4K can only store its charge if the weapon is fully charged.

- The delay between being submerged in ink with a stored charge and the laser appearing is 20 frames.

- When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.6 seconds.

- When charging a shot while in the air, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.6 seconds.

[2]

- ▲ Has the ability to store a full charge for one second in squid/octopus form.

- ▲ Range when not fully charged is not reduced by about 20%.

- ▲ Time taken to fully charge is 2/60 seconds faster.

- ▲ Fully-charged ink consumption: 30% → 25%.

- ▼ Movement speed while not charging or firing is reduced by 8.3%.

- ▼ Range is decreased by about 15%.
▼ Max range: 340 units → 290.5 units.

- ▼ Max range: 340 units → 290.5 units.

- ▼ Maximum damage without full charge: 100 → 80.

- ▼ There is a glow while charging and gets brighter the more the weapon is charged, increasing visibility for opponents.

- ▼ Max range: 340 units → 290.5 units.

- ▲ Increased the amount of ink splattered by each shot when it hits the ground.

- ▲ Points to fill special gauge: 180 → 170.

- ▲ Increased speed of fully-charged shots by roughly 50% without changing shot distance: 64 units/frame → 96 units/frame.

- ▲ Area at player's feet will now always be inked when firing.

- ▲ Increased damage dealt to the barrier around the Rainmaker by a fully-charged shot by roughly 15%: 2x → 2.3x.

- ▲ Increased the effect of the Main Power Up gear ability.

- ▲ The increase to shot range with the maximum number of Main Power Up gear abilities equipped has been raised from roughly 3% to roughly 5%.

- ▲ In addition to the existing effect, Main Power Up will now also improve ink coverage.

- ▲ Increased damage dealt to opponent Splat Brellas by 17%: 3x → 3.5x.

- ▲ Increased damage dealt to opponent Tenta and Undercover Brellas by 20%: 2x → 2.4x.

- ▲ Increased damage dealt to Bubble Blower by 23%: 1.3x → 1.6x.

- ▲ Increased damage dealt to opponent Booyah Bomb armor by 4%: 1.3x → 1.35x.

- ▲ Increased damage dealt to opponent Splash Walls by 10%: 2x → 2.2x.

- ▲ Reduced the time from releasing a charged shot to being ready to shoot by roughly 2/60 of a second.

- ▼ Points to fill special gauge: 170 → 180.

- ▼ Points to fill special gauge: 180 → 190.

The Custom E-liter 4K maintains all the great features of the original but features a bold new look! The three Squid Beakons the set comes with allow you to exert some map control or provide avenues into enemy turf for your allies! What's more, the Bubble Blower gives you even more power to light up the enemy from a safe position! If your thing is supporting your team from the back while having the power to strike fear in your foes, this is the weapon set for you!

- Promotional image

- Holding the Custom E-liter 4K

- Shooting ink

- Front-most Octoling holds the Custom E-liter 4K

The Custom E-liter 4K returns in Splatoon 3's Fresh Season 2024 update. It has Squid Beakons and Kraken Royale, which is based on the Custom E-liter 3K's kit in Splatoon. The design has been recolored and now features a red plastic handle and shell, instead of the typical blue.

- The Custom E-liter 4K is a heavyweight weapon.

- The matchmaking range is 31. The game's matchmaking system looks at a team's average matchmaking range value, and matches them against a team with a similar average.

- Ink consumption scales from 2.25% to 25% depending on the charge level.
The full-charge ink consumption of 25% allows players to fire 4 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.
This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- The full-charge ink consumption of 25% allows players to fire 4 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.

- This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- The Custom E-liter 4K can store its charge while submerged in ink.
A stored charge can be held for up to 1.25 seconds (75 frames).

- A stored charge can be held for up to 1.25 seconds (75 frames).

- The Custom E-liter 4K can only store its charge if the weapon is fully charged.
The delay between being submerged in ink with a stored charge and being able to fire the charge is 31 frames.
The delay between being submerged in ink with a stored charge and the laser appearing is 25 frames.

- The delay between being submerged in ink with a stored charge and being able to fire the charge is 31 frames.

- The delay between being submerged in ink with a stored charge and the laser appearing is 25 frames.

- It takes 1.53 seconds to fully charge the weapon (92 frames).
When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.6 seconds.
When charging a shot while in the air, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.6 seconds.
The weapon must charge for at least 8 frames before it can release its charge.

- When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.6 seconds.

- When charging a shot while in the air, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.6 seconds.

- The weapon must charge for at least 8 frames before it can release its charge.

- The full-charge ink consumption of 25% allows players to fire 4 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.

- This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- A stored charge can be held for up to 1.25 seconds (75 frames).

- The delay between being submerged in ink with a stored charge and being able to fire the charge is 31 frames.

- The delay between being submerged in ink with a stored charge and the laser appearing is 25 frames.

- When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.6 seconds.

- When charging a shot while in the air, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 4.6 seconds.

- The weapon must charge for at least 8 frames before it can release its charge.

- The interval between firing and being able to submerge in ink is 15 frames.

- Fully charged shots will  pierce opponents.

- When charging while moving, the player's movement speed is set to 0.015 units per frame.

- After firing, there is a 20 frame cooldown before the ink tank starts refilling.

- Damage scales from 40 to 80 depending on the charge level. At full charge, the damage is 180.

- Shot distance scales from 10.75 units to 30.76 units depending on the charge level.
The range of charger weapons is impacted by the position of the weapon's muzzle in its model file. These range numbers account for this variation.

- The range of charger weapons is impacted by the position of the weapon's muzzle in its model file. These range numbers account for this variation.

- The range of charger weapons is impacted by the position of the weapon's muzzle in its model file. These range numbers account for this variation.

[3][4]

- ▼ Points to fill special gauge: 200 → 210

The Custom E-liter 4K maintains all the great features of the original but features a bold new look. The Squid Beakons it comes with can give your respawning allies a way in, but you could also use them yourself to get the firing solution you need. And if anyone gets the bright idea to sneak up on your position, break out the Kraken Royale special! We'll see how sneaky they feel being chased by an unstoppable juggernaut! It might not be the most intuitive charger on the market, but once you master its tools, the battlefield is your oyster. I'd recommend it to any experienced sniper seeking an edge!
